SELECT SG.MEMBER_CODE , SG.STARTGAME_TIME , 'LOCATION' AS DIVISION,L.LOCATION_NAME AS DIV_VALUE FROM STUDYGAME SG JOIN MEMBER M ON ( SG.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE ) JOIN LOCATION L ON ( M.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE ) WHERE M.LOCATION_CODE = ( SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code})
UNION
SELECT SG.MEMBER_CODE , SG.STARTGAME_TIME ,'JOB' AS DIVISION, M.MEMBER_JOB AS DIV_VALUE FROM STUDYGAME SG JOIN MEMBER M ON ( SG.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE ) JOIN LOCATION L ON ( M.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE ) WHERE M.MEMBER_JOB = ( SELECT MEMBER_JOB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code})
